overview.title: 1. GENERAL POLICY
overview.content:
⚠️ NO RETURNS OR REFUNDS ACCEPTED

Due to the digital nature of our products (ECU reprogramming files), NO RETURNS OR REFUNDS ARE ACCEPTED once the file download is completed.

digitalServices.title: 2. LEGAL BASIS
digitalServices.content:
This policy is based on current Spanish legislation:

Article 103.m) of Royal Legislative Decree 1/2007:
digitalServices.noReturns: The right of withdrawal shall not apply to contracts for the supply of digital content which is not supplied on a tangible medium where performance has begun with the consumer's prior express consent and acknowledgment that they lose their right of withdrawal.

expressConsent.title: 3. EXPRESS CONSENT
expressConsent.content: By proceeding with the purchase and download of our digital files, you:
list: Grant your express consent for immediate delivery of digital content
Acknowledge that you lose your right of withdrawal once download begins
Accept that you cannot request a return or refund for any reason
Confirm having read and understood this policy before purchase

exceptionalCircumstances.title: 4. AFFECTED PRODUCTS
exceptionalCircumstances.content: This policy applies to ALL our digital products, including:
list: System deletion files (DPF, EGR, AdBlue, etc.)

refundProcess.title: 5. INVALID REASONS FOR RETURN
refundProcess.content: The following reasons do NOT constitute grounds for requesting a return:
steps: Vehicle damage resulting from file use

partialRefunds.title: 6. PRE-PURCHASE VERIFICATION
partialRefunds.content:
It is the customer's sole responsibility to verify before purchase:

• File compatibility with their specific vehicle
• Required technical specifications
• Legality of use in their country/region
• Technical capability for installation
• Acceptance of associated risks
partialRefunds.calculation:
7. TECHNICAL SUPPORT

Although we do not offer refunds, we do provide:

• Basic technical support for installation
• Compatibility information (before purchase)
• Installation guides when available
• Response to reasonable technical inquiries

Important: Technical support does not include performance guarantee or liability for damages.

paymentDisputes.title: 8. EXCEPTIONAL CASES
paymentDisputes.content:
In very exceptional cases, we might consider:

• Technical error in delivering the correct file
• Corrupt or damaged file (replacement will be provided, not refund)
• Double charge due to payment system error

These cases will be evaluated individually and the final decision is at our discretion.

modifications.title: 9. CLAIM PROCESS
modifications.content:
If you believe your case falls under the mentioned exceptions:

• Contact us within 24 hours after purchase
• Provide clear evidence of the technical problem
• Include all transaction details
• Await our evaluation (maximum 5 business days)

contact.title: Contact for Claims
contact.content: For exceptional cases, contact us through our official support channels.

consent.title: 10. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
consent.content: By making a purchase on our website, you confirm that you have read, understood, and completely accept this Refund Policy, as well as our Terms of Service.
